title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 247.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 247.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

This Part applies to outdoor wood boilers. Sections
247.3
and
247.4
of this Part apply generally
to all outdoor wood boilers. In addition to the general provisions, sections
247.5 through
247.9
apply specifically to new
outdoor wood boilers. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
247.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
